item.title: 2.2: Vi Editor
item.description: Chapter X Vi Editor Getting Started Warning This topic is still in progress… Open a new file $ vim Press i to enter insert mode and start typing. Once done, press ESC to go to normal mode to save and continue editing or exit. save the new file :w FILE save and exit :wq FILE Open a new file with a name or existing file $ vim sample.txt Press i for insert and ESC to exit insert mode and
